Module com.bd
Package dao

Class AppointmentsDao

java.lang.Object
dao.AppointmentsDao
public class AppointmentsDao extends Object
Handles data manipulation and retrieval from the Appointments database table.
Author:
Brandi Davis

  • Method Details

    • insertAppointment

      public static void insertAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, LocalDateTime createDate, String createdBy, LocalDateTime lastUpdated, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId) throws SQLException
      Inserts appointment record into database.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the appointment
      description - the description of the appointment
      location - the location of the appointment
      type - the type of appointment
      start - the local start date and time of the appointment
      end - the local end date and time of the appointment
      createDate - the local date and time of the appointment creation
      createdBy - the user who created the appointment
      lastUpdated - the local date time of when the appointment is updated
      lastUpdatedBy - the user that last updated the appointment record
      customerId - the customer ID associated with the appointment
      userId - the user ID associated with the appointment
      contactId - the contact ID associated with the appointment
      Throws:
      SQLException - in the event of an error when executing the insert statement

    • SelectAppointments

      public static void SelectAppointments() throws SQLException
      Selects all appointments in the database and creates appointment objects. The appointments are added to the all appointments Observable list in the Appointments Class
      Throws:
      SQLException - in the event of an error when executing the query

    • UpdateAppointment

      public static void UpdateAppointment(int appointmentId, String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, LocalDateTime lastUpdated, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId) throws SQLException
      Updates an appointment record in the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the selected appointment ID to update
      title - the title of the appointment
      description - the description of the appointment
      location - the location of the appointment
      type - the type of appointment
      start - the local start date and time of the appointment
      end - the local end date and time of the appointment
      lastUpdated - the local date time of when the appointment is updated
      lastUpdatedBy - the user who last updated the appointment
      customerId - the customer ID associated with the appointment
      userId - the user ID associated with the appointment
      contactId - the contact ID associated with the appointment
      Throws:
      SQLException - in the event of an error executing the update statement

    • DeleteAppointment

      public static void DeleteAppointment(int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      Deletes appointment record from the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the appointment to be deleted
      Throws:
      SQLException - in the event of an error executing the delete statement

    • SelectDistinctApptType

      public static void SelectDistinctApptType() throws SQLException
      Selects distinct appointment types for the report that counts appointments by month and type.
      Throws:
      SQLException - in the event of an error executing the query

    • hasAppointment

      public static Boolean hasAppointment(int customerId) throws SQLException
      Determines if a customer has an appointment.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the customer to query
      Returns:
      boolean, true or false value if an appointment is found
      Throws:
      SQLException - in the event of an error executing the query

    • SelectMonthAndType

      public static void SelectMonthAndType(int month, String type) throws SQLException
      Selects appointments with a specified month and type. Creates appointment object(s) and adds to filtered list
      Parameters:
      month - the month of the appointment to query
      type - the type of the appointment to query
      Throws:
      SQLException - in the event of an error executing the query

    • CountAppointmentFilter

      public static void CountAppointmentFilter(String type, int month) throws SQLException
      Counts the number of appointments of a specified month and type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of appointment to query
      month - the month of the appointment to query
      Throws:
      SQLException - in the event of an error executing the query

    • SelectAppointmentCountryCount

      public static void SelectAppointmentCountryCount(int countryId) throws SQLException
      Counts the appointment(s) in the specified Country.
      Parameters:
      countryId - the Country ID to query for the appointment count
      Throws:
      SQLException - in the event of an error executing the query

    • SelectAppointmentByContact

      public static void SelectAppointmentByContact(int contactId) throws SQLException
      Selects the appointments of the specified contact. Creates appointment object(s) and adds to filtered list
      Parameters:
      contactId - the contact ID to query
      Throws:
      SQLException - in the event of an error executing the query
